author: protolambda
content: Pyrmont is close to non-finalization, it's missing finality just by a few percent sometimes. Lighthouse team (~17% of network stake) nodes appear to be all offline ( <@!361447803194441738> <@!602753420033785856> ) . We are looking into it, but the sigp team may not be awake to get them back online right now. Meanwhile also 5/20 EF nodes (4% of network stake, 2x lighthouse, 3x nimbus) are offline, I'll try to get them back on.

author: protolambda
content: Back to 86%, aiming at 90%. Pyrmont has always been lower due to inactive users not properly submitting validator-exits, so pretty happy if we get 90%.
